about_me.about_me_text: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Berlin. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about_me.work_flexibility: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Berlin and remotely.
about_me.work_cognition: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about_me.work_quality: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.skill_text: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skills.feel_free: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skills.tech_enthusiasm_hover: I have a special interest in learning

portfolio_projects.explore_work: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

info.join_project: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
info.game_project: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

references.title: What my colleagues say about me

ben.name: B.Dei - Team Partner
ben.reference: Lukas Balz is someone you can rely on, not only because he is very inquisitive and has incredible know-how, but also because he was always on hand with help and advice when we were stuck. I very much hope that I will have the pleasure of working with him again.

can.name: C.Oeter - Team Partner
can.reference: Working with Lukas was an absolute enrichment. He made an extremely large contribution to the success of the Join Kanban project in particular, which we worked on as a group. He always shone with his commitment and expertise and mastered even complex challenges with ease. Lukas is not only reliable, but also brings his full passion to every project.

konstantin.name: K.Stark - Team Partner
konstantin.reference: During our collaboration on the “Kochwelt Website” project (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), Lukas Balz impressed us with his excellent organization and leadership of the group work. His ability to lead the team from the beginning showed his strong organizational skills. Lukas is a motivated, reliable and helpful team player. His ability to work in a team and his commitment, with which he supported and motivated the entire team, deserve special mention. Working with him was consistently pleasant and productive. Due to his strengths, I am very happy to recommend Lukas Balz for future projects.

contact_me.title: Let's work together
contact_me.contact_through_form: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact_me.your_name_required: Oops! it seems your name is missing
contact_me.how_can_i_help_placeholder: Hello Lukas, I am interested in...
contact_me.how_can_i_help_required: What do you need to develop?
contact_me.check_box_second_part: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
